ingredients.ingredient: 1 dash hot sauce, or to taste

cookingTips: Melt butter over low heat to prevent burning and keep the egg delicate
Scramble the egg gently until just set but still slightly creamy
Assemble immediately while egg is still warm for the best texture
enrichment.coachingPrompt: This is a creative use of a hot dog bun. What other unexpected bread vessels could be used for interesting breakfast combinations?
